sentences.sContent: These grains may parch, but they will not pop.
sentences.sContent_eng: These grains may parch, but they will not pop.
sentences.sCn: 这些谷类只能被烤干，却不可能爆开。

remMethod.val: 用火把 (torch) 来烘烤 (parch) → 烤干

words.tran: 焦的；炎热的；炒过的；干透的
烘干；使极渴（parch的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: if the sun or wind parches something, it makes it very dry
